subtitle: Good morning everyone It's Sunday
and I'm working hard today on preparing the lectures for this week
Got some great lectures on Monday night in Brooklyn we are going to
be speaking about Franz Kafka fascinating literary
figure with a complicated sense of Jewish identity
I think it will be really an interesting talk I'm really a long-time fan of Kafka although
I find him difficult to understand.
By the way I'm outside in Cedarhurst Park just chilling and hoping to give my brain
some fresh energies so that I can write something really great
for you in the lectures.
On Wednesday night here in Cedarhurst we have a fantastic
lecture on the Ramchal and the discussion of the controversy over
the influence of Shabbetai Tsvi the famous false
messiah of the seventeenth century
Just exactly how much was involved in the Ramchal's thought and why was he so
bitterly criticized Anyway, it's going to be a great week
I think these two lectures are going to be a lot of fun
and I hope you will be able to join us, either in person
or via the web and I would al so like to encourage you to
consider sponsoring some of these lectures we would really like to bump up the technical
level, we have a student intern we need to support, and your sponsorship is really crucial!
You will gain eternal Internet fame because I would be very happy
to thank you online and the videos are viewed by a lot of people around the world and that's
a really great thing, but of course there's the altruistic value of simply supporting
the study of Jewish history.
Anyway, that's it, I hope you have a fantastic Sunday, it is absolutely gorgeous here and
I hope your day is gorgeous as well.
Take care.
